file_content.text: Worked with you once, maybe again. Many battles left to fight. Remain in the shadows, for now.
Freed Zeven, and other Fa'athra slaves. Unexpected, interesting outcome. Nem'ro pleased. Good work, yes?
I love unexpected, interesting outcomes. Bit of a hobby of mine.
Try "great."
Mission succeeded far beyond expectations. Fa'athra wounded, time to press advantage.
Quit talking funny and pay up.
Enough of your chattering.
Hot-tempered, but useful. Created turning point in Nem'ro-Fa'athra war. Factory crippled, Fa'athra's profits limited.
Yes.
Nem'ro secrets safe, Fa'athra denied factory labor. Impressive results.
I did some bad work too, but nobody saw.
Mostly, yeah.
Modesty unnecessary. Fa'athra factory damaged, good news for Nem'ro.
Zeven leaves bonus for freeing his slave friends. Sentimental, illogical. Should have kept it for myself.
Reward and bonus, contract concluded. High satisfaction, yes? Farewell.
Ah, tracking chip. Not unexpected. Nem'ro will miss Zeven. But everything must end someday, yes?
Smuggling is a dangerous line of work.
Zeven led a risky life.
Zeven understood risks. Professional, unsentimental, fatalist. Good qualities.
We all have it coming. Just a question of when.
That's how I see it.
Yes, inescapable truth. Hoping personal time of death far in the future.
My condolences.
Explanations unnecessary. Alternate objective successful, threat to Nem'ro eliminated. All good.
Just give me my money, you freak.
Pay up, ugly.
Insulting, hostile, greedy. But contract fulfilled. Anticipate silence to follow.
Reward as promised. War continues, but maybe ends sooner thanks to you. Goodbye.
Zeven remains a slave in the Rust Yards. Free him or silence him. No other options, yes?
Know you. Seen you around Nem'ro's palace. Heard your interesting reputation.
Name is Kraay. Paid by Nem'ro to sabotage Fa'athra. Goal to end Hutt war from shadows. Good work, very exciting.
Learned of hole in Nem'ro's security. Gotta seal it before Fa'athra discovers. Want in? Risky, but profitable.
I'm usually hired to make holes in things, not seal them.
I'm not a delicate work type.
Job allows opportunities for both. Satisfaction guaranteed, yes?
Keep talking.
Everything you hear, keep confidential. No careless whispers, yes?
I'll have to charge extra for putting up with your babble.
You talk funny.
Conversation part of mission, yes? Already factored into payment.
Fa'athra patrol captured Nem'ro smuggler in random sweep, but didn't know it. Fa'athra patrol threw smuggler into Rust Yards as slave. Fools.
Smuggler knows Nem'ro's business. If smuggler is exposed, business is compromised. Immediate action required, yes?
How much could this smuggler know?
Is it that serious?
Very much. If smuggler talks, Fa'athra gains advantage. Unacceptable.
Sure seems that way.
Nem'ro considers smuggler useful. Rescue preferred, if possible.
Your people can't do it?
Ordered to remain in shadows. Tasked with finding freelancer to rescue smuggler. One like you.
Mission objective, use this device. Deactivate smuggler's slave collar, free him. If device fails, drastic measures authorized.
Alternate objective, silence smuggler permanently. Snag tracking chip from base of smuggler's skull as proof.
What sort of information is on this tracking chip?
Tell me about the chip.
Personal identification. Unique to smuggler, yes? Proof of smuggler's silence.
Do you prefer him alive or dead?
Which outcome pays more?
Escaped or silenced, all the same to Nem'ro. Not a problem, yes?
Harsh.
Hutta offers nasty life for the squeamish, yes? After job, consider relocating.
Nice to have options.
Too much at stake, yes? Fa'athra must not discover smuggler's identity or secrets.
Free Zeven or get tracking chip from his skull, then return. Earn credits, leave happy. You in?
I'll poke around and see if I can free this man.
Guess it can't hurt to try.
Excellent. Knew you were right for this job.
Zeven imprisoned in Rust Yards slave pen. Identified by green skin, tattoos, excitable temperament. Species: Mirialan.
Fair point.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
Unfortunate decision. Others will come, accept mission. Go now.
Can't talk right now. Go, return later.
